WHO CAN APPLY?
 Any student
 • Who is willing to learn and work under supervision.
 • Who wants to help other young kids to achieve mental peace and success.
 • And have a basic understanding of the internship they are applying for.

 We are offering the internships under the following departments :
 1. Content Writers
 2. HR Interns
 3. PR Interns
 4. Social Media Interns
 5. Graphic Designer
 6. Video Editor
 7. Operations
 8. Promotions
 9. Management
 10. Content Creator (Digital Course)
 11. Creative Team
 12. Event Team
 13. Technical
 14. Others
 Stipend: NA (Though you can find all perks of this internship below) Interested students are requested to fill the form by August 9th EOD.
